mapper.select: SELECT C.CHATROOM_NO AS "CHAT_ROOM_NO", S.USER_NO AS "USER_NO", M.USER_NO AS "USER_NO_2", CM.CREATE_DATE AS "CREATE_DATE_2", C.CREATE_DATE AS "CREATE_DATE", S.SELL_NO AS "SELL_NO", AVG FROM CHAT_ROOM C LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN CHAT_MESSAGE CM ON (C.CHATROOM_NO = CM.CHATROOM_NO) JOIN SELL S ON(C.SELL_NO = S.SELL_NO) JOIN ( SELECT AVG(REV_SCORE) AS "AVG", S.USER_NO FROM REVIEW R JOIN SELL S ON (S.SELL_NO = R.SELL_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY S.USER_NO) PP ON (S.USER_NO = PP.USER_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND C.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CM.CREATE_DATE DESC
